description:
<p>We are recruiting for a part-time (0.5wte) clinical or counselling psychologist to join the Newham Early Intervention in Psychosis Team, based in Canning Town, east London. If successful, you would join a well-established MDT with a strong psychology presence, delivering evidence-based psychological treatments to clients experiencing a first-episode of psychosis.</p>
<p> </p>
title: Clinical/Counselling Psychologist
